patch.summary: Update a single product with Json Merge Patch functionality
patch.description: Updates a single product. This endpoint supports Json Merge Patch functionality, which allows partial updates to be made to the product. parameters.description: [Optional] A pagination token used to jump to first, last, next or previous pages. When supplied, it overrides all other filter parameters.

parameters.name: FromDate
parameters.description: [Optional] Start date for filtering invoices by invoice date.

parameters.name: ToDate
parameters.description: [Optional] End date for filtering invoices by invoice date.

parameters.name: InvoiceTypes
parameters.description: [Optional] Filter invoices by invoice type. Valid values: Shipping,WarehouseStorage,Inbound Fee,Return,AdditionalFee,Credits

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Number of invoices to return per page (default: 100). Must be between 1 and 1000.

parameters.name: SortOrder
parameters.description: Sort invoices by Invoice Date. Values - Ascending, Descending. Default: Descending.

post.summary: Estimate Fulfillment Cost For Order
post.description: This endpoint will provide, where possible, an estimate of pricing and fulfillment center assignment of a potential standard (direct to consumer) order. Keep in mind that there are ways for the merchant to change FC assignment or product configuration after order creation that could invalidate this estimate. Estimates cannot be returned for items that are unknown, out of stock, or too large for fulfillment using standard box sizes. Additional services such as high-pick fees, shipping insurance, auto-splitting or auto-adding items to orders, and signature required are not included in this estimate.

parameters.name: shipbob_channel_id
parameters.description: Channel Id for Operation

Billing.InvoiceDto.description: Data transfer object representing an invoice.

currencyCode.description: The ISO currency code used in the invoice (e.g., USD, EUR).

invoiceDate.description: The invoice date in yyyy-mm-dd format.

invoiceType.description:
The type or category of the invoice. Available options:
- Shipping  
- Inbound Fee  
- WarehouseStorage  
- AdditionalFee  
- Return   
- Credits  
- BalanceAdjustment  
- Payment

runningBalance.description: The running balance of the account after this invoice is applied.

Billing.InvoiceDtoV3.description: Data transfer object representing an invoice.

currency_code.description: The ISO currency code used in the invoice (e.g., USD, EUR).

invoice_date.description: The invoice date in yyyy-mm-dd format.

invoice_type.description:
The type or category of the invoice. Available options:
- Shipping  
- Inbound Fee  
- WarehouseStorage  
- AdditionalFee  
- Return   
- Credits  
- BalanceAdjustment  
- Payment

running_balance.description: The running balance of the account after this invoice is applied.

taxAmount.description: Tax amount charged for the tax type.

taxRate.description: Rate of Tax charged for the tax type

taxType.description: Type of tax charged for eg. GST

tax_amount.description: Tax amount charged for the tax type.

tax_rate.description: Rate of Tax charged for the tax type

tax_type.description: Type of tax charged for eg. GST

additionalDetails.description: Any additional details related to the transaction in a key-value pair format.

currencyCode.description: The ISO currency code (e.g., USD, EUR) for the transaction.

fulfillmentCenter.description: The name or code of the fulfillment center involved in the transaction.

invoiceDate.description: The date the invoice was generated.

invoiceId.description: The unique identifier of the related invoice.

invoiceType.description:
The type or category of the invoice. Available options:
- Shipping  
- Inbound Fee  
- WarehouseStorage  
- AdditionalFee  
- Return   
- Credits  
- BalanceAdjustment  
- Payment

referenceId.description: A unique reference identifier associated with the transaction.

referenceType.description:
The type of reference associated with the ReferenceId. Available options:
- Shipment  
- Return  
- WRO  
- URO  
- Ticket Number  
- FC  
- LPN Reference  
- Transfer Plan

taxes.description: A list of tax details applied to the transaction if exists.

transactionFee.description:
The fee type associated with the transaction for eg. Shipping fees
To get all the available transaction fees use the endpoint -  '/transaction-fees'

transactionType.description:
The classification or nature of the transaction 
Transaction Types - Charge, Refund, Credit, Payment, BalanceAdjustment

currency_code.description: The ISO currency code (e.g., USD, EUR) for the transaction.

fulfillment_center.description: The name or code of the fulfillment center involved in the transaction.

invoice_date.description: The date the invoice was generated.

invoice_id.description: The unique identifier of the related invoice.

To get all the available transaction fees use the endpoint -  '/transaction-fees'

transaction_type.description:
The classification or nature of the transaction 
Transaction Types - Charge, Refund, Credit, Payment, BalanceAdjustment

from_date.description: Start date for filtering transactions by transaction charge date.

invoice_ids.description: List of invoice IDs to filter transactions

invoiced_status.description:
Filter Transactions by invoicing status:
- True(Billed Transactions)
- False(Unbilled Transactions)
- null (Billed + Unbilled Transactions)

page_size.description: Number of transactions to return per page (default is 100, to be entered when API is called for first time). Must be between 1 and 1000.

Unique id of the channel

gift_message.description: Gift message associated with the order

location_id.description: Desired Fulfillment Center Location ID. If not specified, ShipBob will determine the location that fulfills this order.

order_number.description: User friendly orderId or store order number that will be shown on the Orders Page. If not provided, referenceId will be used

origin_platform_program.description: Origin platform program for the order. Accepts a program name.

products.description: Products included in the order. Products identified by reference_id must also include the product name if there is no matching ShipBob product.

purchase_date.description: Date this order was purchase by the end user

reference_id.description: Unique and immutable order identifier from your upstream system

sales_channel.description: Origin platform source for the order. Accepts a sales channel name that is case insensitive and the list of acceptable values can be found at https://support.shipbob.com/s/article/ShipBob-Developer-API

shipping_method.description: Client-defined shipping method matching what the user has listed as the shipping method on the Ship Option Mapping setup page in the ShipBob Merchant Portal. If they dont match, we will create a new one and default it to Standard

tags.description: Key value pair array to store extra information at the order level for API purposes. ShipBob won't display the info in the ShipBob Merchant Portal or react based on this data.

estimated_price.description: Estimated price in dollars for the provided shipping method

shipping_method.description: Provided shipping method. Maps to ship option in ShipBob.

total_weight_oz.description: Total weight of items in cart including packaging.

products.description: Products to be included in the order. Each product must include one of reference_id or id

shipping_methods.description:
Array of strings specifying shipping methods for which to fetch estimates.

If this field is omitted we will return estimates for all shipping methods defined in ShipBob

id.description: Unique id of the product (Must be provided if reference_id is unknown)

quantity.description: The quantity of this product ordered

reference_id.description: Unique reference id of the product (Must be provided if ID is unknown)

estimates.description: Array of estimates for each shipping method

company_name.description: Name of the company receiving the shipment

country.description: The country (Must be ISO Alpha-2 for estimates)

zip_code.description: The zip code or postal code

total_price.description: Sum of all line item prices, discounts, and taxes in USD

Orders.RetailerProgramDataAddressViewMod.description: Address to used when creating a B2B/DropShip order.

Orders.RetailerProgramDataViewModel.description: Contains properties that needs to be used for fulfilling B2B/Dropship orders.

addresses.description:
Ship From - Certain retailers want to display the ship from address as their return facility, not Shipbobs warehouse address        /// 
Mark For Address - Final destination address

doNotShipBeforeDate.description: The date the retailer does not want the order shipped by.

purchase_order_number.description: First initial documentation sent from buyer to seller with item(s) and quantities.

shipByDate.description: The date the retailer has requested the order to ship by.

id.description: Unique id for the service level

name.description: The name or title of the service level

active.description: Indicates if the shipping method is active

default.description: Indicates the shipping method is a ShipBob default shipping method.

id.description: Unique id for shipping method.

name.description: Name of the ship method as selected by the merchant and saved in ShipBobs database (i.e. ground). Corresponds to the shipping_method field in the Orders API.

log_type_id.description: Log type id of the shipment

Orders.ShipmentProductViewModel.description: Information about a store product belonging to a shipment

id.description: Unique id of the product

inventory_items.description: Information about fulfillable inventory items belonging to this product

reference_id.description: Unique reference id of the product

sku.description: Stock keeping unit for the product

location_id.description: Unique ShipBob Id of the Fulfillment Center to which the shipment was assigned

order_id.description: Unique ShipBob Id of the parent order

reference_id.description: The Reference Id ingested with the original order

shipment_id.description: Unique ShipBob Id of the shipment

status_datetime.description: Datetime when the shipment entered into the requested status (according to request filters)

store_order_id.description: The Store Order Id ingested with the original order

store_order_tags.description: The raw tag data ingested with the original store order

actual_fulfillment_date.description:
The datetime of ShipBobs completion of the fulfillment operation as promised.
Currently, this means the shipment has been picked, packed, and label has been printed.

delivery_date.description: The datetime of Shipment delivered to customer.

estimated_fulfillment_date.description:
The datetime of ShipBobs commitment for completing
the shipment and handing to the carrier for delivery.

gift_message.description: Gift message associated with the shipment

id.description: Unique id of the shipment

insurance_value.description: Monetary amount that this shipment was insured for

invoice_amount.description: Monetary amount that was invoiced for this shipment

is_tracking_uploaded.description:
Indicates whether the Shipment was marked with tracking information
uploaded to a third-party system where the order originated.

last_tracking_update_at.description: Timestamp for the last time this shipment had a tracking update

last_update_at.description: Date this shipment was last updated

order_id.description: Id of the order this shipment belongs to

products.description: Information about the products contained in this shipment

reference_id.description: Client-defined external unique id of the order this shipment belongs to

ship_option.description: Name of the shipping option used for this shipment

status_details.description: Additional details about the shipment status

Orders.ShippingTermsViewModel.description: Contains shipping properties that need to be used for fulfilling an order.

description.description: Describes what the status detail means

id.description: The id of the status detail

inventory_id.description: Inventory Id the detail applies to (if applicable)

name.description: Short name of the status detail

bol.description: Bill of lading (BOL) number. Document acknowledging receipt of cargo for shipment.

carrier_service.description: The carrier's service which was used for this shipment

pro_number.description: Tracking number used for freight carriers

scac.description: Standard Carrier Alpha Code (SCAC). Unique 2-4 letter code used to identify transportation companies.

tracking_url.description: URL to the website where a shipment can be tracked

Orders.UpdateShipmentModel.description: Model for Updating multiple shipments of the same Order

is_tracking_uploaded.description:
Indicates whether the Shipment was marked with tracking information
uploaded to a third-party system where the order originated.

Products.AmazonChannelMetadataRequestMod.description: Amazon Sales Channel Information with custom Amazon Fields

Products.Get.Api.Product.LastUpdatedTime.description: Looks for Products that have been updated since the given date

Products.Get.Api.V5.Product.CategoryIds..description: List of Category Ids associated with product

Products.Get.Api.V5.Product.ChannelIds.L.description: Looks for Products variants by their channel IDs

Products.Get.Api.V5.Product.HasDigitalVa.description: Looks for Products with/without digital variants

Products.Get.Api.V5.Product.InventoryId..description: Looks for variants by its associated inventory id

Products.Get.Api.V5.Product.LastUpdatedT.description: Looks for Products that have been updated since the given date

Products.Get.Api.V5.Product.LegacyIds.Li.description: Looks for Products with by Legacy Product Id(s)

Products.Get.Api.V5.Product.PlatformIds..description: Looks for Products variants by their external Platform IDs

Products.Get.Api.V5.Product.ProductId.Li.description: Looks for Products with an assigned Id

Products.Get.Api.V5.Product.SKU.String.description: Looks for Products that match the provided Sku query

Products.Get.Api.V5.Product.SalesChannel.description: Looks for Products variants assigned to a platform/sales channel

Products.Get.Api.V5.Product.SellerSKU.St.description: Looks for Products that match the provided Seller query

Products.Get.Api.V5.Product.TaxonomyIds..description: Looks for Products variants by their taxonomy id or any descendants of the taxonomies sent separated by comma

Products.Get.Api.V5.Product.VariantId.Li.description: Looks for products that contain a variant with the given ID

Products.Get.Api.V5.Product.VariantStatu.description: Looks for Products with variants that contain provided status

id.description: Unique reference ID for the product

Receiving.AddBoxItemToBoxModel.description: Information about an inventory item contained inside a receiving order box

inventory_id.description: Unique inventory id of the items in the box

lot_date.description: Lot expiration date for the items in the box

lot_number.description: Lot number of the items in the box

quantity.description: Quantity of the items in the box

Receiving.AddBoxToOrderModel.description: Information about a box shipment to be added to a receiving order

tracking_number.description: Tracking number for the box shipment

Receiving.AssignOrderToFulfillmentCenter.description:
Model containing information that assigns a receiving order to a fulfillment center.
If the fulfillment center provided is in a receiving hub region, then the response will be the receiving hub location.

id.description: ID of the fulfillment center to assign this receiving order to

Receiving.BoxItemViewModel.description: Information about an item contained inside a box as part of a receiving order

inventory_id.description: Unique identifier of the inventory item

lot_date.description: Expiration date of the item's lot

lot_number.description: Lot number the item belongs to

received_quantity.description: Quantity of the item that was received after processing the receiving order

stowed_quantity.description: Quantity of the item that has been stowed

Receiving.BoxViewModel.description: Information about a box shipment included in a receiving order

box_items.description: Information about the items included in the box

box_number.description: The number of the box in the receiving order

counting_started_date.description: Date counting of the box's inventory items started

tracking_number.description: Tracking number of the box shipment

Receiving.CreateReceivingOrderModel.description: Information to create a new receiving order

boxes.description: Box shipments to be added to this receiving order

expected_arrival_date.description: Expected arrival date of all the box shipments in this receiving order

purchase_order_number.description: Purchase order number for this receiving order

address1.description: Address line one of the fulfillment center

address2.description: Address line two of the fulfillment center

city.description: City the fulfillment center is located in

country.description: Country the fulfillment center is located in

email.description: Email contact for the fulfillment center

id.description: Unique identifier of the fulfillment center

phone_number.description: Phone number contact for the fulfillment center

state.description: State the fulfillment center is located in

timezone.description: Timezone the fulfillment center is located in

zip_code.description: Postal code of the fulfillment center

expected_quantity.description: Quantity of the inventory item submitted in the WRO

received_quantity.description: Quantity of the inventory item received by the warehouse

stowed_quantity.description: Quantity of the inventory item stowed by the warehouse

Receiving.V2.ReceivingOrderStatusHistory.description: View model for receiving order status history

id.description: Unique id of the status

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the status was recorded

box_labels_uri.description: URL to the packing slip to be included in each box shipment for this receiving order

expected_arrival_date.description: Expected date that all packages will have arrived

external_sync_timestamp.description: The timestamp in UTC when a 3rd party integrator has set in our system

id.description: Unique id of the warehouse receiving order

insert_date.description: Insert date of the receiving order

inventory_quantities.description: Inventory items and quantities within the WRO

last_updated_date.description: Last date the receiving order was updated

purchase_order_number.description: Purchase order number for a receiving order

status_history.description: The history of status changes for this receiving order

id.description: Unique id of the channel

inventory.description: Array of inventory items being returned

original_shipment_id.description: Shipment from which the items in the return originated

reference_id.description: Client-defined external unique identifier for the return order

tracking_number.description: Tracking number for the return shipment

id.description: Unique identifier of the fulfillment center

action_taken.description: Action(s) taken when processing the return

id.description: Unique id of the inventory item

quantity.description: Quantity expected to be processed with the return

instructions.description: Specific instructions to be taken for the inventory when processing the return

action_reason.description: Reason the given action was taken

quantity_processed.description: Quantity of inventory processed with the taken action

id.description: ID of the inventory item to return

quantity.description: Quantity of the returned inventory item in the return

completed_date.description: Completed date for a return order.

customer_name.description: Customer name from the related shipment.

id.description: Unique id of the Return Order

insert_date.description: Date this return order was created

inventory.description: List of inventory included in the return order

invoice_amount.description: Invoiced amount of return order (sum of transaction amounts)

original_shipment_id.description: Id of the corresponding shipment that is the souce of the return

reference_id.description: Client-defined external unique id of the return order

store_order_id.description: Store order for the related shipment.

tracking_number.description: Tracking number of the return shipment

transactions.description: Array of transactions affiliated with the return order

Webhooks.Delete.V2.Webhook.Id.Id.String.description: This is the id of the webhook subscription to delete

Webhooks.Get.V2.Webhook.Cursor.String.description: The number of records to skip before starting to return the results. Used for pagination.

Webhooks.Get.V2.Webhook.RecordsPerPage.I.description: Number of webhooks returned per page in a paginated response.

created_at.description: TimeStamp the webhook subscription was created

id.description: ID of the webhook subscription

secret.description: A secret key used to sign the webhook payload for verifying its authenticity on the receiver's end.

topics.description: List of event types the webhook will receive notifications for

url.description: URL subscription events will be posted to

secret.description: A secret key used to sign the webhook payload for verifying its authenticity on the receiver's end.

topics.description: The event types for which webhook callbacks will be received.

url.description:
The URL that will be called when an event matching the subscription topic occurs.
The URL must use HTTPS, accept POST requests, and handle content of type application/json.

created_at.description: TimeStamp the webhook subscription was created

enabled.description: TimeStamp the webhook subscription was created

id.description: ID of the webhook subscription

topics.description: List of event types the webhook will receive notifications for

url.description: URL subscription events will be posted to

PAT.description: Authentication using Personal Access Token (PAT) token
